mapper.select: SELECT s_num, s_title, s_content, s_uploadPath, s_fileLoca, s_fileName, s_fileRealName, s_rate, reg_date, r_name, mem_num FROM( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rn, s_num, s_title, s_content, s_uploadPath, s_fileLoca, s_fileName, s_fileRealName, s_rate, reg_date, r_name, mem_num FROM eatstamp.stamp, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE mem_num = #{mem_num} ORDER BY s_num DESC ) t1 WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE stamp SET s_title=#{s_title}, s_content=#{s_content}, s_rate=#{s_rate}, r_name=#{r_name}, s_tag=#{s_tag}, s_uploadPath=#{s_uploadPath}, s_fileLoca=#{s_fileLoca}, s_fileName=#{s_fileName}, s_fileRealName=#{s_fileRealName} WHERE s_num=#{s_num}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stamp AS s JOIN member AS m ON s.mem_num = m.mem_num AND s.mem_num=#{mem_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stamp ( s_title, s_content, s_uploadPath, s_fileLoca, s_fileName, s_fileRealName, reg_date, s_rate, r_name, mem_num, s_tag ) VALUES ( #{s_title}, #{s_content}, #{s_uploadPath}, #{s_fileLoca}, #{s_fileName}, #{s_fileRealName}, #{reg_date}, #{s_rate}, #{r_name}, #{mem_num}, #{s_tag} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM stamp s JOIN member m USING(mem_num) WHERE s.s_num=#{s_num}
